alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Northern Fulton; Northern Herkimer; Northern Warren; Schoharie; Western Albany; Western Greene; Western Schenectady; Western Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 13 at 12:10PM EDT until March 15 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy, wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 24 inches with localized totals of 2 to 3 feet across the higher terrain of the eastern Catskills and Helderbergs. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...The eastern Catskills, the western and southern Adirondacks, Schoharie Valley and Helderbergs in eastern New York. * WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to 8 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible, including the Tuesday morning and evening commute. The weight of the heavy wet snow on tree branches will likely result in power outages. Snowfall rates will exceed two inches per hour at times, especially late tonight into Tuesday morning. Strong winds will also result in very low visibility, especially Tuesday into Tuesday night. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...This will be a long duration and high- impact snow event.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
